visual_dna.palette: Coca-Cola red (#F40009) 80%, white text for contrast
visual_dna.lighting: Even and direct lighting highlighting texture
visual_dna.style: Classic, iconic branding with modern elements

strategic_analysis.audience: Broad, all ages, brand loyalists and casual consumers

image_composition_analysis.focal_points: Center-aligned bottle with high saliency; large, bold typography draws focus
image_composition_analysis.typography_style: Bold sans-serif, balanced with iconic script, high visibility

analysis.prompt_reconstruction: Classic product photography, Coca-Cola bottle on red background, even lighting, strong contrast, Coca-Cola brand colors, symmetrical composition, commercial advertising style --ar 16:9 --style iconic
